dict.acceptation: 舐，吮吸；吸入；通过吸吮的动作产生声音；<俚>巴结；

sent.orig: To suck or take in(air, for example); inhale.
Does that mean we still have to suck up to her?
sent.trans: 那意味着我们还得去巴结她？

sent.orig: Kanda drew the lovely pole into his mouth and to suck, slowly but firmly.
sent.trans: 神田把这可爱的东西含入口中开始吮吸，速度虽慢但却异常坚定。

sent.orig: Don't try to teach your grandmother to suck eggs.
Suck up the embarrassment; tell the truth, we decided.
sent.trans: 我们决定不必扭扭捏捏，不好意思，把事实真相告诉大家。
